content: This is excellent James. I think there is a lot here about the unintended consequences of prioritizing the wrong things. It is amazing how many suboptimal decisions are made in the economy through the protection of “maximizing shareholder value” (I assume your proxy for this was economics). Do do you have any initial ideas how to shift this thinking? In some of my work with Boards and CEOs it has been almost shocking at how deeply ingrained this belief system is.
